sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbndtceckmanage ( BNDT_CECK_SE /* */ , BNDT_CECK_CODE /* */ , BNDT_CECK_CODE_NM /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #bndtCeckSe# /* */ , #bndtCeckCode# /* */ , #bndtCeckCodeNm# /* */ , #useAt# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbndtceckmanage SET BNDT_CECK_SE=#bndtCeckSe# /* */ , BNDT_CECK_CODE=#bndtCeckCode# /* */ , BNDT_CECK_CODE_NM=#bndtCeckCodeNm# /* */ , USE_AT=#useAt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE BNDT_CECK_SE=#bndtCeckSe# /* */ AND BNDT_CECK_CODE=#bndtCeckCode# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnbndtceckmanage WHERE BNDT_CECK_SE=#bndtCeckSe# /* */ AND BNDT_CECK_CODE=#bndtCeckCode# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT BNDT_CECK_SE /* */ , BNDT_CECK_CODE /* */ , BNDT_CECK_CODE_NM /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnbndtceckmanage WHERE BNDT_CECK_SE=#bndtCeckSe# /* */ AND BNDT_CECK_CODE=#bndtCeckCode# /* */

SELECT BNDT_CECK_SE /* */ , BNDT_CECK_CODE /* */ , BNDT_CECK_CODE_NM /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnbndtceckmanage WHERE 1=1
BNDT_CECK_SE = #searchKeyword# /* */
BNDT_CECK_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY BNDT_CECK_SE DESC /* */ , BNDT_CECK_CODE DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnbndtceckmanage WHERE 1=1
BNDT_CECK_SE = #searchKeyword# /* */
BNDT_CECK_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
